name: Wisp-Lash
description:
A game about forgotten dieties, transmitting their energy in exchange for soul power.

Become the biggest soul as fast as you can, but beware - the more soul you carry, the slower you become.

Wisp-Lash was made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2018, together with part of Ratchet Audio for sounds and music. We had a ton of fun making this simple game, which is best enjoyed with a few friends!
